Extensions::Core::Numbers

Constants

FACTORS
MAX_ROMAN

Public Instance Methods

romanize() click to toggle source

Returns roman equivalent of the integer This function is featured in the pickaxe book

# File lib/extensions/core.rb, line 23
def romanize
  num = self.to_i
  roman = ""
  unless num < 1 || num > MAX_ROMAN
    for code, factor in FACTORS
      count, num = num.divmod(factor)
      roman << (code * count)
    end
  end
  roman.downcase
end

[Validate]
